getBet

static int getBet(int cash)
Recieves a legal bet from the player. Illegal bets are less than zero or more than the player's current money cash.

Parameters:
cash - Amount of money player has.
Returns:
the bet entered by the player

resolveOutcome

static int resolveOutcome(int player,
                          int dealer)
Determines whether the player wins and outputs an int to multiply bet by.

Parameters:
player - the value of the player's hand
dealer - the value of the dealer's hand
Returns:
1 if player wins 0 if push -1 if player losses
